description:
A performance jersey with feminine styling. This light jersey won't be out of place on weekend group rides or solo spins. All the right details are covered from a trio of back drop-in pockets to a gripped hem that keeps the back in place. Made with soft breathable fabrics, you'll stay cool even when it's hot out.

  • ProSecco Strada Donna fabric is soft, moisture wicking and highly breathable
  • Gripped hem with a drop tail provides good coverage
  • Full length YKK® Vislon zipper lets you vent
  • 3 back drop-in pockets
  • Reflective details
  • UPF 45 stops more than 97% of harsh UV in its tracks
  • Castelli recommends this jersey for 18°-32°C temperatures
name: Castelli Anima 4 Jersey - Women's
